response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's important to extend a tailored offer that respects both the significance of the product and your financial considerations. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This figure encapsulates the product's exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, while also ensuring a fair return for us. We trust this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
